objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Guide the growing vine with your mouse cursor.

Collect sun & water to increase available growth time. Sunlight will give a temporary speed boost and water will give a temporary turn speed boost (non-stacking).

Be careful not to cross over your vine or you will get tangled and permanently slowed.

Press (A) to burrow underground to slow the growth timer countdown. Press (D) to return above ground.  When charged up, press (S) to prune your vine and remove old segments cluttering the area.

inlineCode: const keyManager = runtimeScene.getGame().getInputManager(), S_KEY = 83, W_KEY = 87, A_KEY=65,D_KEY=68,SPACE_BAR=32
const clamp = (number, lower, upper) => gdjs.evtTools.common.clamp(number, lower, upper)
